snippet: George Zimmerman, the former neighborhood watch volunteer charged with killing Trayvon Martin, asked for a new judge on Friday, claiming that the current one was biased.
abstract: George Zimmerman, the former neighborhood watch volunteer charged with killing Trayvon Martin, asks for a new judge, claiming that the current one is biased.
lead_paragraph: George Zimmerman, the former neighborhood watch volunteer charged with killing Trayvon Martin, asked for a new judge on Friday, claiming that the current one was biased.

headline.main: Florida: Zimmerman Wants Another New Judge
headline.print_headline: Florida: Zimmerman Wants Another New Judge
